history.content:
8/25/19 update: After a long discussion with Prof Garcia we have decided to re-open the wait list. Keep in mind that we do have resource constraints that we have to work around so please remember that while it's likely you can get into the class there are no GUARANTEES that you will get into the class if you are on the wait list. 

===original post====

On Friday, I closed the wait list for CS 61C. The class has expanded as far as it can and we simply do not have the space or resources to expand it again. Students who are currently wait listed will have to wait for already-enrolled students to drop and may not get into the class.

In general, if you NEED a class to meet a certain requirement, it's highly recommended that you use phase 1 or phase 2 units to position yourself well on the wait list. Although we hope to accommodate everyone in lower division classes, we don't always have the resources to do so and you should not EXPECT classes to expand infinitely.
